title: Tristana Bug
body:
Hi, Iv found a bug while playing Tristana recently where her cannon merges with her head when stopping her running animation.
It also happens with her Recall animation. 

I have only used Riot Girl Tristana, and don't know if this bug is also present on other skins.

replies.body:
Heya **BrewMaStar**,

While we do appreciate you taking your time to report a bug here in the Help and Support boards, you'll likely want to report bugs in the [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) boards to gain more visibility from the relevant Riot staff!
